original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 21.5. Cūḷantaraduka, Kusalattika
analyzed: cūḍantaraduka kusalattika

original: Naappaccayaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sappaccayo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na appaccayam na kusalam dhammam paccayā sappaccayaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naappaccayaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sappaccayo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na appaccayam na akusalam dhammam paccayā sappaccayaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naappaccayaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na appaccayam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sappaccayaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naasaṅkhataṁ …pe…. (Sappaccayadukasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: na a saṅkhatam pe sat paccaya duka sadisa

original: Nasanidassanaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassano kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sanidassanam na kusalam dhammam paccayā anidassanaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasanidassanaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassano akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sanidassanam na akusalam dhammam paccayā anidassanaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasanidassanaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassano abyākato dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na sa nidassanam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassanaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano abyākato dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na sa nidassanam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca anidassanaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasanidassanaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassano abyākato
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na sa nidassanam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassanaḥ abyākataḥ

original: ca anidassano abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
analyzed: ca anidassanaḥ abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi

original: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasappaṭighaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā appaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sappaṭigham na kusalam dhammam paccayā appaṭighaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasappaṭighaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā appaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sappaṭigham na akusalam dhammam paccayā appaṭighaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasappaṭighaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sappaṭigham na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca sappaṭighaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naarūpiṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā arūpī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na arūpim na kusalam dhammam paccayā arūpī kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naarūpiṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā arūpī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na arūpim na akusalam dhammam paccayā arūpī akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Narūpiṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca rūpī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na rūpim na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca rūpī abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nalokuttaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā lokiyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na lokuttaram na kusalam dhammam paccayā lokiyaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nalokuttaraṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā lokuttaro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na lokuttaram na kusalam dhammam paccayā lokuttaraḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe avigate dve

original: Nalokuttaraṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā lokiyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na lokuttaram na akusalam dhammam paccayā lokiyaḥ akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nalokiyaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na lokiyam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nalokuttaraṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na lokuttaram na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca lokiyaḥ abyākataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: dve adhipatiyā dve pe avigate dve

original: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyam na kusalam dhammam paccayā kenacid viññeyyaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kenaci naviññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na kenaci na viññeyyam na kusalam dhammam paccayā kenaci na viññeyyaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nakusalañca nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paccayā kenaci viññeyyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: na kenaci viññeyyam na kusalam ca na kenaci na viññeyyam na kusalam ca dhammam paccayā kenaci viññeyyaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi sabbattha nava

original: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kenaci viññeyyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na kenaci viññeyyam na akusalam dhammam paccayā kenaci viññeyyaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kenaci naviññeyyo akusalo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na kenaci na viññeyyam na akusalam dhammam paccayā kenaci na viññeyyaḥ akusalo

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe avigate nava

original: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kenacid viññeyyam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca kenacid viññeyyaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava adhipatiyā nava pe avigate nava
